PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08052020-10-09,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations, No. 2 (COVID-19 — Wage Subsidy for Furloughed Employees)
PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 — Wage Subsidy for Furloughed Employees) in order to extend the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy (CEWS) treatment for furloughed employees to October 24, 2020.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/
AttachmentsAttachment
